excerpt: "Ai-jen Poo described the work domestic workers do as “fundamental to human life” in a virtual lecture hosted by Notre Dame’s Liu Institute for Asia and Asian Studies Thursday evening. Poo is the co-founder and executive director of the National Domestic Workers Alliance (NDWA)."
